thread.section_title: Lube Mobile Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Lube Mobile | lubemobile.com.au
thread.title: Simon Fisher
thread.title_full: Lube Mobile reviewed by Simon Fisher

author: Simon Fisher
title: Simon Fisher
text:
A near breakdown issue last minute and no time to wait for my usual mechanic made me call on Lube Mobile to come to my home on a Saturday morning.
Johnny (Van:W32) was extremely helpful and polite. He explained in simple terms the details of everything that was wrong. He prioritised honestly what was critical for my car and what could wait then went to work with passion on getting it fixed for me the same day.
Not only did he fix my car but he took the time to clean the parts of my engine as he went. I haven't seen it look this good in years. Johnny is not just a skilled mechanic but takes pride in his work. He was a pleasure to deal with & I look forward to using him again in the future.
